alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 6:10PM EDT until April 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 610 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Bainbridge, or near Bainbridge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Cairo, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Climax, Vada, Hanover, Ausmac, Akridge, Grady Co A/p, Capel, Elpino, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Harrells Still, Cyrene, Peoples Still, Spence and Pine Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
